metadata.name: Mega Satan Key Ritual+
metadata.description:
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod adds an alternative way to obtain the Mega Satan Key.
[h1]How it works[/h1] Once you reach the [b][u]Dark Room[/u][/b], you can exchange all of your hearts*, coins, keys and bombs for the Mega Satan Key by stepping on the spikes on the ground.
Each sacrified thing will give you a [b][u]damage bonus[/u][/b]: [list] [*]Heart: +0.50 [*]Coin: +0.01 [*]Key/Bomb: +0.05 [/list]
Additional rules: [list] [*]Total damage bonus is limited to +10. [*]The ritual will give you 1 black heart for every item from Devil Item Pool you own (max +5 black hearts in total). [*]If you already own 1 piece of the key, you will recive 2 additional black hearts. [*]If you own 1 or more items from Angel Item Pool, the ritual will [b][u]not[/u][/b] show up. [/list]
*[u]Note[/u]: you will remain with: [list] [*]1 red heart (if you have 1 or more health coontainers) [*]1 black heart (if you have 0 health containers) [/list]
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Afterbirth+ and Repentance.
[hr][/hr] Similar mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2782602396
